items.sentence: Tom showed Mary how to boil water in a paper cup.
Tom speaks English with a distinct French accent.
Tom spent all weekend reading a historical novel.
Tom started taking piano lessons three years ago.
Didn\'t you know Tom passed away three years ago?
Didn\'t you know that Tom was going to Australia?
Within one month of going abroad, he became sick.
Would you like to say something to everyone here?
Yesterday, I got a call out of the blue from Tom.
Tom\'s bedtime is nine o\'clock on school nights.
